EmailTemplate.subject: [Forrester Report + Webinar] Enable your Enterprise for the Future
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
IT executives are being asked to increase operational efficiency and contribute to their company’s innovation and transformation initiatives. While these goals may seem antithetical, the era of cloud computing has made them complimentary by abstracting infrastructure concerns and supporting developer productivity.
Read Forrester’s Predictions: 2018 Cloud Computing Accelerates Enterprise Transformation Everywhere <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/predictions-2018-cloud-computing-accelerates-enterprise-transformation-everywhere?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=forrester-exec-q118]]>, to learn about the trends to consider when defining an IT strategy that can help you achieve new levels of operational efficiency and support your transformation efforts.
View the Report <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/predictions-2018-cloud-computing-accelerates-enterprise-transformation-everywhere?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=forrester-exec-q118]]>
Want more insight from Forrester? Join us <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/feb-27-digging-into-forrester-s-total-economic-impact-of-cloud-foundry-study-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=forrester-exec-q118]]> for a webinar on February 27 at 10am PST to discuss The Math Behind (and Beyond) Digital Transformation.
Register today <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/feb-27-digging-into-forrester-s-total-economic-impact-of-cloud-foundry-study-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=forrester-exec-q118]]>
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
